name: After School Programs
description: The Stonestown Family YMCA After School Program takes place on-site at Miraloma School. Students receive academic support, participate in outdoor recreation, and engage in enrichment activities, Monday through Friday, from release at the end of school until 6:00pm. SF RECREATION & PARKS (formerly LATCHKEY) Located next to our school at Miraloma Playground (aka "Sandy Park"), SF Rec & Park's Miraloma After School Program provides after school care for kids in grades K-5 (5-11 years old) daily f

howToGetIt: For Stonestown Family YMCA programming: Contact the YMCA after school program: (415) 690-6403 or use YMCA Online registration TOOL. For SF RECREATION & PARKS (formerly LATCHKEY): Please call (415) 831-6800 or email sfreconline@sfgov.org, or use SF RECREATION & PARKS Online registration TOOL.
cost: This is a fee based service, sliding scale is available with proof of income requirements.
